content.title: Chief Minister Nari Shakti Yojana
content.details: The objective of this scheme is integrated work related to social empowerment, cultural empowerment and economic empowerment related to the development of women. Along with this, Bihar State Women's Information and Resource Center / Gender Resource Center is operated for the collection, storage, publication, and dissemination of information related to women, research and development.
benefits: Under social empowerment: Women's helpline, short stay home, defense home, working women's hostel, child care home.
Under cultural empowerment: Women cultural fairs and award scheme to self-help groups for innovative work.

Under economic empowerment: Training of women in employable vocational courses in service sector and employment or association with self-employment, training work research for service sector and Innovative for new ideas regarding their development and empowerment Planning is to be encouraged.
eligibility: Adolescent girls and women will be eligible under Mukhyamantri Nari Shakti Yojana.
The benefit of Chief Minister Nari Shakti Yojana will be provided only to women.
The applicant should be a permanent resident of the state of Bihar.
The benefit of this scheme will be provided equally to both rural and urban women.
It is necessary for the applicants to have the necessary documents.
content.application_process: Online. Applicants have to visit the official website of the Social Welfare Department, Bihar. After registration, they will receive a user id and password to log in and complete the application form.

faqs.question: What Is Chief Minister Nari Shakti Yojana?
faqs.answer: Mukhyamantri Nari Shakti Yojana has been started by the Government of Bihar with the aim of providing financial support to the girl students who have passed the preliminary examination of UPSC to prepare for the main examination.

faqs.question: How Much Scholarship Is Given Under This Scheme?
faqs.answer: Under this scheme, Assistance will provided for social empowerment, cultural empowerment and economic empowerment.

faqs.question: What Are The Documents Required To Apply For Nari Shakti Yojana?
faqs.answer: To apply in this scheme, documents like Aadhaar card, residence certificate, ration card, photo copy of bank passbook, caste certificate (if applicable), passport size photo, mobile number etc. will be required.

faqs.question: How To Apply In Chief Minister Nari Shakti Yojana?
faqs.answer: You can apply online in this scheme by visiting the official website of Social Welfare Department, Bihar.

faqs.question: May other state person apply for this scheme?
faqs.answer: No, The applicant should be a permanent resident of the state of Bihar.

faqs.question: Can men also apply for this?
faqs.answer: No, The benefit of Chief Minister Nari Shakti Yojana will be provided only to women.

faqs.question: Is there any educational eligibility also applicable?
faqs.answer: The benefit of Nari Shakti Yojana will be given only to those girl students and women who have passed the preliminary examination of UPSC.

faqs.question: Can Urban women also get the same benefits under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The benefit of this scheme will be provided equally to both rural and urban women.
